name: Triton Combat Robots
tagline: Our mission is to spark innovation in the field of robotics by bringing undergraduate designs to life and to represent UC San Diego at robotics competitions.
body:
### WHAT IS TCR
Triton Combat Robots seeks to bring recognition to the robotics community at UC San Diego by competing in robotics competitions all over the nation. We also aim to foster innovation by undergraduates in the field of robotics by serving as an incubator for robotics projects. Got an idea for a robot? Pitch it to us and we could provide you with the resources necessary to bring your innovation to life!

### HOW TO GET INVOLVED
Join us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/groups/1594276177505078/

### WHO ARE WE
![Mahaela Johnson](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jeffleft/TCR/master/board_images/mahaela.jpg)  
Mahaela Johnson, President

![Jeffrey Wang](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jeffleft/TCR/master/board_images/me.jpg)  
Jeffrey Wang, VP Internal

### Questions? Comments?
Contact me at Jeffrey.TCR@gmail.com!
